room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We booked the hangover as a work group activity. There were parts of the experience that made one "blush" at times but that is why there is an age restriction! We worked great as a group and the clues provided really kept us moving. Been to other rooms, but this was my FAVORITE so far. Just booked body collectors to do next!

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: Did the Hangover escape room with a group of friends for a birthday and it did not disappoint. The level of detail alone was worth it and it was consistent from start to finish. They took no shortcuts and provided a great experience. Can't recommend enough if you enjoy escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Hangover" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: Loved it! Was my first escape room but it was so much fun! My group did the "hangover" room and it was elaborate and a great time! Hope to return to try another room!
